title: Understanding Data Inventory Challenges
text: Consider the various factors that can make data inventory challenging. Think beyond just regulations. What other elements might contribute to the complexity of managing data inventory?

title: Exploring Non-Regulatory Challenges
text: Reflect on the technical aspects of data inventory. How might the volume of data, data quality, or integration with existing systems pose challenges?

title: Considering Organizational Factors
text: Think about the role of organizational structure and resources. How might these influence the ease or difficulty of conducting a data inventory?

title: Analyzing the Statement
text: Given the various factors that can affect data inventory, is it accurate to say that regulations are the sole challenge?
